trans-unit.source: The PartialResultProcessing enumeration specifies the required type of partial results processing.
trans-unit.target: PartialResultProcessing 枚举指定的处理的部分结果所需的类型。

trans-unit.source: An application performing an asynchronous operation can use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest%2A> method, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest%2A> method, and (optionally) the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate in the standard .NET style.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行的异步操作的应用程序可以使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest%2A>方法，<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest%2A>方法，以及 （可选）<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委托中的标准.NET 样式。</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application retrieving partial results can call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest%2A> and pass either ReturnPartialResults or ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback as the `partialMode` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 检索部分结果的应用程序可以调用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest%2A>并将传递 ReturnPartialResults 或作为 ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback`partialMode`参数。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios, use NoPartialResultSupport for better performance and scalability.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，用于 NoPartialResultSupport 更好的性能和可伸缩性。

trans-unit.source: The use of ReturnPartialResults or ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback is only recommended in the scenario where the retrieval of partial results is desired.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ReturnPartialResults 或 ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback 仅建议在方案中检索的部分结果的地方。

trans-unit.source: For example, when performing a search with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryNotificationControl> specified, the search results are returned only when changes are made to that object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在执行与搜索时<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryNotificationControl>指定，搜索结果将仅在对该对象进行更改时，才返回。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryNotificationControl>

trans-unit.source: The search never completes and partial results are returned.
trans-unit.target: 搜索永远不会完成并返回部分结果。

trans-unit.source: The application will not retrieve partial results.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不会检索部分结果。

trans-unit.source: The application will retrieve partial results.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将检索部分结果。

trans-unit.source: An application will retrieve partial results and use the callback mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将检索部分结果，并使用回调机制。
